title: Aaron Rodgers future, Rams losing coaches, Vikings decisions, Kyler Murray questions and Nate Burleson
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers future, Rams losing coaches, Vikings decisions, Kyler Murray questions and Nate Burleson
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss the importance of Aaron Rodgers future and how it could be the most important story in the offseason. Sean McVay is losing several coaches from his staff, how will that effect his plan moving forward. The Vikings have an interesting offseason ahead and the crew wonders how the younger head coach and GM will look at Kirk Cousins and his contract. Kyler Murray and the Cardinals need to put all this speculation to rest. Could we see several QB's traded in the coming months? Plus, Nate Burleson joins us to talk Aaron Rodgers as well as his interviews with Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
